channel.title: Hyperion vs Rs2dv
channel.description:
*I wasn't sure where to post this topic, so I decided to do it here. If I posted in the server downloads section, I'm pretty sure it wouldn't be noticed as much*
Anyways, I'm curious which base I should start out with (I'm not going to choose one of the thousands of links you see on the server downloads section). I have a lot of experience with deltas, I find that many, many servers you see in the download section are either someones 1 hour worth of work after leeching. Also a lot of these people have no idea how to use Java Conventions.
So, I need help deciding. I haven't heard much between the two besides the fact that Hyperion has great stability. Even if you don't want to post some of the pros + cons of the two. Could you at least vote between the two?
Thanks.

item.title: Hyperion vs Rs2dv
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

m.dog311:

Its not overcomplicated at all.

It honestly isn’t. The packaging takes getting use to. But once you figure that out it’s a breeze in the wind.

The hype of it being hard to program is shit. After all it uses Java, Java is Java.

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion vs Rs2dv
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:12, topic:379554”][quote author=Canownueazy link=topic=475389.msg3478239#msg3478239 date=1295868623]

[quote author=blakeman8192 link=topic=475389.msg3476397#msg3476397 date=1295734949]

It’s obvious.

That helped a lot, thanks.

Hyperion is by far better.

Is there anything that matches against hyperion?
[/quote]Apollo, but it isn’t released yet.
And I guess you could use Osiris. my extremely overcomplicated server.
[/quote]

Anyway Hyperion is easier to use

Its not overcomplicated at all.[/quote]Yes it is

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion vs Rs2dv
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

It’s obvious.

Is runesource as “powerful” as Hyperion?

That helped a lot, thanks.

Hyperion is by far better.

Is there anything that matches against hyperion?
[/quote]Apollo, but it isn’t released yet.
And I guess you could use Osiris. my extremely overcomplicated server.
[/quote]

Anyway Hyperion is easier to use

Its not overcomplicated at all.

[failtroll]osiris is nothing, wanna see complicated?
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,463556.0.html[/failtroll]
OT
But yeah hyperion is better by a longshot in my opinion, but i think rune-source beats all of them, its simple, yet a nice base.[/quote]

Read full topic
